string.text: That you will tell, Barman...

Here that, Marked One... You have pleased me, have brought documents from Agroprom... If it will be necessary to modify the armor, address! I can establish a various kind devices of night vision, and also reinforce suits, having raised, thereby, their wear resistance
Thanks, Barman, just that is necessary...
That you can offer from updatings of suits?
Night vision, please...
Do you want it installed on a standard suit, or a reinforced one?
On a standard suit...
Excellent... Onto which suit would you like it fitted?
The Easy Stalker suit...
The Suit of the Stalker...
The Stalker suit 'Veteran-1'...
The Stalker suit 'Veteran-2'...
The Stalker suit 'Veteran-3'...
The Scientific Stalker suit...
The Improved Stalker suit 'Veteran-1' with gas mask...
The Improved Stalker suit 'Veteran-2' with gas mask...
The Improved Stalker suit 'Veteran-3' with gas mask...
The Improved Stalker suit 'CSu-1' with gas mask...
The Improved Stalker suit 'CSu-2k' with gas mask...
Ghost Suit
The Suit of the tourist...
The Suit a Strelok...

I can offer for the facilitated Stalker suit:
- PNV 'Green' - 10,000Ru
- PNV 'Digital' - 25,000Ru
- PNV 'Sepia' - 15,000Ru
- PNV 'Halogen' - 20,000Ru
- PNV 'Cats Eye' - 30,000Ru
- PNV 'Psi-effect' - 25,000Ru
- PNV 'Moonlight' - 25,000Ru
- PNV 'White Night' - 30,000Ru
Which would you like?
Standard 'Green'...
'Digital'...
'Sepia'...
'Halogen'...
'Cats Eye'...
'Psi-effect'...
'Moonlight'...
The best, please - 'White Night'...
